personalInfo.tagline: Innovative Solutions in Sustainable Infrastructure: Designing Resilient and Eco-Friendly Civil Engineering Projects
personalInfo.description: üåê Civil Engineer | BIM | Structural Design | Sustainable / Low-Carbon Construction Civil Engineer with 2 years of experience in structural design, BIM modeling, and site supervision. Currently studying at ESTP, with a strong interest in eco-construction and low-carbon (bas carbone) building methods. Skilled in AutoCAD, Revit, Civil 3D, and Robot Structural Analysis. Experienced in coordinating project teams, managing deadlines, and ensuring on-site quality control. Detail-oriented, proactive, and a clear communicator, with growing knowledge of lean construction, sustainable design principles, and BIM 360 digital collaboration. üå± Motivated to contribute to smarter, cleaner, and more resilient construction solutions.
